  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92780</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92780</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">La Terre tournante</string>
            <string language="en">The rotating earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die drehende Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A terra girando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La terra di rotazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η περιστρεφόμενη γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La tierra que rota</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre combien un point de la  surface de la terre se déplace en vingt-quatre heures dû  à la  rotation de la terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how much a point on the Earth's surface moves in twenty-four hours due to the Earth's rotation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Rotation de la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement planétaire</string>
            <string language="en">planetary motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wieviel ein Punkt auf der 
Oberfläche der Masse in twenty-four Stunden wegen der Umdrehung der 
Masse verschiebt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra quanto um ponto na 
superfície da terra se move em twenty-four horas  devido à rotação
da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra quanto un punto sulla 
superficie della terra si sposta in twenty-four ora dovuto la 
rotazione della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πόσο ένα σημείο στη 
γήινη επιφάνεια κινεί σε εικοσιτέσσερις ώρες λόγω προς τη γήινη
περιστροφή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cuánto se mueve una 
punta en la superficie de la tierra sobre veinticuatro horas de  
debido a la rotación de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse Umdrehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">planetarische Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rotação da terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento planetário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rotazione della terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento planetario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γήινη περιστροφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πλανητική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rotación de la tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento planetario</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
